name: Discern Lies
text: Make a Religion check. Use the result as a bonus to your Insight checks to discern any untruths spoken in your presence during the duration. If anyone aided you while performing this ritual, they can’t help you make the resulting Insight checks.
flavorText: His lies quiver through the ether like water thrown on a hot griddle. The suspect doesn’t even know he’s giving off this signal, but to you it’s clear as day.
